articles.title: India#39;s households wrestle with inflation as incomes dip
articles.description: Tea, edible oil, pulses, meat, cooking gas and services have gone up by 20 percent-40 percent since the COVID-19 pandemic began in early 2020 - hurting consumers while their incomes have fallen below levels seen before the health crisis.
